title: Week 1: Introduction to Reinforcement Learning
description: Overview, Definitions, Importance, and Applications of reinforcement learning.

title: Week 2: Markov Decision Processes (MDPs)
description: Formalization of MDPs, Components, and Framework.

title: Week 3: Dynamic Programming and Planning
description: Exploring Bellman Equations, Policy Evaluation, and Policy Improvement.

title: Week 4: Model-Free Prediction and Control
description: Understanding Value Functions and Monte Carlo Methods.

title: Week 5: Q-Learning and Off-Policy Methods
description: Key Concepts of Q-Learning, including Exploration vs. Exploitation.

title: Week 6: Function Approximation and Generalization
description: An introduction to Linear and Non-linear Function Approximation.

title: Week 7: Policy Gradient Methods
description: Introduction to Policy Gradients and their applications.

title: Week 8: Approximate Dynamic Programming
description: Overview of Approximate Dynamic Programming and its algorithms.

title: Week 9: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning
description: Introduction to Multi-Agent Systems, focusing on Cooperation and Competition.

title: Week 10: Applications of RL in Robotics and Control Systems
description: Real-World Applications and Case Studies of reinforcement learning.

title: Week 11: Reinforcement Learning in Games
description: Exploring the relationship between Game Theory and RL, including applications in Game Development.

title: Week 12: Deep Reinforcement Learning
description: Analyzing the integration of Deep Learning with reinforcement learning techniques.

title: Week 13: Independent Research Project – Proposal Presentations
description: Guidelines for Projects and Presentation Techniques for research proposals.

title: Week 14: Project Workdays and Feedback Sessions
description: Group work, peer review, and instructor feedback sessions for ongoing projects.

title: Week 15: Final Project Presentations and Course Wrap-Up
description: Student presentations of final projects followed by a Q&A session.
